alert.note: Alert for Dare (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Northern Dare County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 827 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to three to four inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Manns Harbor, Nags Head, Mashoes, Manteo, East Lake, Whalebone, Buffalo City, Roanoke Island Festival Park, Jockeys Ridge State Park, Nags Head Fishing Pier, Wanchese, Bodie Island Lighthouse and Outer Banks Fishing Pier.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report flooding to your local law enforcement agency when you can do so safely.
